reviews.review_msg: Sonya is a fantastic professor. She really cares about her students and wants to see them succeed. Whether you are interested in Labour Studies or just need the credits you will not regret this class. Highly recommend. Reading and course work are manageable. Put in the effort and you will do well.
Sonya teaches in a very straightforward manner with clear expectations. She cares about her students and ensures the concepts are clearly understood by everyone. Great class!

I took her LBST 313 class in Spring 2019 (in person). Concepts are clear and teaches well, but be warned that she is a hard marker (puts on her lawyer hat); you will easily be criticized for organization, grammar, punctuation, consistently, and flaw in arguments. Easy to get B/B+, but difficult to get A. Spend time doing research on assignments.

The materials are interesting - she tried to keep the class engaged, but there was a small class size and barely anyone participated. Mark is based off of assignments and take home exams. She marks hard, as class average was usually 70% and people rarely got above 85%. Worst trait: she takes forever marking and doesn't give you timely feedback...

If you are interested in Labour Studies take Sonya's course! Lectures can be a bit dry but she provides notes to help you follow along. Midterm and final were very easy as long as you review your notes.

I love her class, she is very kind and she is fair but lenient. Her classes are straight to the point. Took it as a fun learning lesson - completely unrelated to my major but I really enjoyed her and the class.
Easy GPA boosting class. I wish Sonya taught more classes! Would take more classes with her.

The lecture material can be a bit dry, but she puts a lot of effort into engaging students to discuss and understand the material. Assignments are fairly straightforward and easy. Lots to read. No final exam, just a quiz at the end of semester, which is easy if you study the material. I would take another class with Sonya again, she is lovely.
Would highly recommend if your GPA needs a boost.

Sonya is boring but nice and caring about her students. No midterm or final. Just one super easy, end of semester quiz. The questions consisted of yes or no answers. The assignments are easy too. GPA booster, just put in effort!

Sonya is amazing! Sadly she does not use powerpoint slides or canvas but the class is an easy A as long as you show up and do your assignments. The assignments for this class are also straight forward and she gives adequate feedback. There is no midterm, just a final quiz at the end of the semester. Attendance is considered participation.
